text: Ahyo nandiwahola wala vilongozi wa hemwe wawele na luhala na uwanzi wawele ndo muwahagule kulawila kuli nhanzi za hemwe, nandiwawika wanji wawe vilongozi wa hemwe kuli vilundo vya wanhu elufu imwe na vilundo vya wanhu miya imwe na vilundo vya wanhu makumi gahano na vilundo vya wanhu kumi. Nandiwahagula kahi vilongozi wang'hangala wanji kulawa chila nhanzi.
